name: aws-multiregion-api
description: Deploy a cross-region serverless API with a global DynamoDB table

scripts.deploy:stack: npm run package application && npm run deploy application && date
scripts.deploy:test: npm run deploy:test:us-west-2 && npm run deploy:test:us-east-1
scripts.deploy:test:us-west-2: npm run config test.us-west-2 && npm run deploy:stack
scripts.deploy:test:us-east-1: npm run config test.us-east-1 && npm run deploy:stack

author: James R. Gisler
